column1: # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=To get to work everyday I take the bus .
#text=I always get to the bus stop early to wait for it to arrive .
#text=Once it comes I board and swipe my metro card to pay .
#text=If I do n't have my card I have to feed money into the machine which always stressed me out for some reason .
#text=Then I choose a seat if one is available .
#text=If I see someone who is elderly or pregnant I always give them my seat .
#text=Sometimes crazy people are on the bus as well .
#text=There is nothing to be done but avoid them and hope they do n't bother you .
#text=The bus stops and starts a lot and passenger board and depart .
#text=When I get to my stop I pull the cord at the top of the bus so the driver knows to stop .
#text=Once we stop I depart the bus and continue on my journey .
